__e: It is over for Buck and everyone knows it but him.
Buck and the kids are out of town. Can I stay here tonight?
- Oh my God. - And thank you...
'Cause you lied to me... not buck, not fucking Alice.
I couldn't watch because I knew Buck wasn't going to find the money.
When I called Buck for advice on this, I never expected he'd send you up here.
Who would have thought that Buck Howard on your resume - would land you a job?
There is a reason, Troy, I am called the Great Buck Howard.
I mean, seriously, how on earth does a guy like you wind up working with Buck Howard?
